summary: An unscrupulous politico marshal and his deputies chase a gang of train robbers whose leader proves that every man has his price.
cast: Kirk Douglas|Bruce Dern|Bo Hopkins|James Stacy|Luke Askew|David Canary|Alfonso Arau|Katherine Woodville|Mark Roberts|Beth Brickell|Dick O'Neill|William H. Burton Jr.|Louie Elias|Gus Greymountain|Allan Warnick|Roger Behrstock|Jess Riggle|Stephanie Steele|Melody Thomas Scott|Dick Armstrong|Larry Finley|Pat Tobin
title: Los justicieros del Oeste
